title: 'Foreigners Seem Smarter Today': Uday Kotak On Rupee's 90 Level Breach Amid Foreign Outflows
description: Billionaire Banker Uday Kotak weighed in on the currency breaching Rs 90 to the dollar on Wednesday, pointing to foreign selling as the immediate trigger. He said the proximate reason for the move was “foreign selling of Indian stocks both FPI & PE under FDI,…
content: Kotak noted that the one-year Nifty dollar return is 0, underscoring why global investors may be pulling back. Still, he framed the moment as part of a much longer cycle. This is a long game, he said… [+1174 chars]
